content.detailedDescription: On may 13 i was on my way home from my parents. i always take the same road home . the lay of the land in this area is pretty flat, farm land. as i was driving i abserved a light to my north that was very strange. it had or it was shooting out a ball of light an sucking it back in. i looked to see if anyone was behind me an seen their wasn't so i stoped to get a better look. i watched it for a few minutes an deceided to try an get closer so i drove up to the next road that i knew went in the direction of this thing. i could tell it was a few miles away an i could see it the whole time i was driving. i made a couple turned to get going toward the object. i am very familiar with this area, i have lived here for 35 years.. i came to area that i do a little hunting at so i stoped an started looking around . this area has those big tall power lines running through i,t so as i looked up that is when i saw a large object right over the lines , it sort of came on an went off then back on again, it done this for about 3 minutes. the object was about i guess 150 feet an about as big around as a 18 wheeler. i'm not a spooky person but to my supprised i did get a very strange feeling that i may be in danger so i got back in my truck an went home
content.summary: This thing was over power lines, it was shooting out a ball and bringing it back. at first it was a ball then it turned into a cigar shape

content.detailedDescription: We saw a cigar shaped object hovering early one morning on the way to work.  it appeared to be silver mostly, with a touch of pinkish to the right, the bottom appeared to me to be light. can,t say i saw light, but, rather, it appeared the bottom was maybe emitting light.  it was hovering. over a hilltop, at tree level, and appeared to be about half as tall as the trees, douglas firs, so, am am quest imaging them to be 100 foot tall, thus making the object 50feet tall approximately.  the object appeared to be in the 200-300 foot long  ballpark.  i saw it first, clear view, no clouds in the sky. i asked stepson what it was, he said he didn't know. i knew a road that lead to the exact area, so i raced to it, checked my watch, was there in one minute and a few seconds. the object was nowhere to be seen. i knew what i was seeing wasn,t normal, so i felt the need to go to it, i had no fear, just major curiosity. we got out of the vehicle, and had a view that we could easily see 30 miles or so in every direction at least. nothing to be seen, anywhere in the sky, no sound, no nothing. the surface area appeared to be untouched. we walked around awhile looking for the object, listening, and examine the ground for any signs . nothing. the object had no wings, no rotor, no conventional shape of any type known flying object. my only regret was not putting my passenger out, to observe the object as i raced to it. i can only assume, as far as i could see, it traveled from a hovering stop to being totally out of a 30 mile view in any direction, so, do the math, it disappeared very quickly.
content.summary: My stepson and i witnessed a cigar shaped object hovering in plain view very close to a road

content.detailedDescription:
Every night when the sky is clear of clouds and dark at night, in between 8:00pm -9:00pm there are 4-5 squares that hover in the sky above my house.
the squares appear to have one red light on the top corners and one white light on the bottom corners.   these squares just hover. over time these things will go up and down slowly and they will move left and right at different heights.
sometimes they will move southeast of my house and appear to go up and down hovering over a power station near my house. after doing that for a while they will return to the sky over and around my house.
when you look at these things with a gun spotting scope they appear to be balls of lightning.
i have watched these things for the last six months.
i need someone to come to my house and tell me what these are.
content.summary: Ufo's over my house

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were out side and were talking when we noticed three perfectly round orbes. they came up over the tree tops and as we watched they vanished one at a time. it was like a timed event they seemed to vanish about 5 minutes apart. they flew in a triangler formation they vanished from left to right one at a time.
content.summary: Three orbes in sky moving north then disipering one at a time

content.detailedDescription:
I lived in tucson az from 1993 to 2003. i was working for the arizona dept of corrections in flornece az. to get there, you travel north to catalina, turn left on st rd 79. this roar goes between to mountains.
i first noticed something hanging above the n. mountain and as i got closer to going in between the oblect went from the right of me to the left of me over the s mountain. this all happened in less then a heart beat. it was on my right and then it was on my left.
there was nothing else in the sky, not even a cloud, and no one else on the road.
it then just disapeared

this was my first sighting.

my second sighting was in the early evening just out side of florence, again on my way to work and i had a passenger another corrections office. we where using the back entry to eyman complex, we exited state rd 79 onto florence /kelvin rd goin east, for about half a mile, then tuen left n. as we started up the road, there appeared a very bright and large light ahead of us. it was up in the area where we would turn left to get to work. the light was a little wider then the road and taller then any of the trees in the area. as we got closer, the light went out. so i sped up to see what it might be. it took about 2 min to ge to where the light had been, there was nothing, nothing to the left, right, or up. this happened in july of 1998.

these where the only things i have seen, besides the lights over pheonix, i did see them along with the 9 others i was with. we watched them for about 10 min nad they did not move other then to blink.
content.summary: Traveling from catalina to florence, the road goes between to mountains, the ufo went from the north mountain to the  south mountain in the blink of an eye!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down river road, i just got off i-75 in venice florida, i saw 3 lights shaped in a triangle. i pulled over and got out of my car and took several pictures... the craft was too close and too big i could not get a good picture. the triangle shape craft flew about 300 to 400 above me... it made no sound....Then it cloaked after about 5 minutes.
content.summary: The triangle shape craft flew about 300 to 400 above me... it made no sound....Then it cloaked after about 5 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: My dad,mom,gma,and i were in the car coming home from family get together in putnam county. it was about 2-230am and we hadnt seen another car for some time. dad was driving,i was in passenger seat and mom and gma were in back. i looked out the window and saw this light keeping pace with the car. it looked to be approx 18-24 inches across. when dad slowed it slowed. when he sped up it sped up. he turned off the headlights thinking it could be a reflection. no change. after about ten miles he finally pulled over and he and i got out of the car. the only thing we saw when we got out was a flash of light in the sky and it was gone. i did search and rescue for a while so i know it wasnt a spotlight. i saw the episode on hangar 1 about lights and stuff and wanted to report this.
content.summary: Light keeping pace with car on highway with no visible source

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were taking our dog for a walk at night, when we turned onto our street we noticed a flash of white light in the sky ahead that disappeared. i continued to look around and to the east i noticed two lines of orange/yellow lights, on a triangular craft. i asked him what it was and as i continued to look i noticed the object appeared solid, as the middle was all black. the object moved from south to north and disappeared behind houses and trees. we were both astonished, knowing immediately what we saw was a ufo. the object appeared to be below the cloud cover and at an arms length was the size of my hand.
content.summary: Saw a triangle shaped object with yellow/orange lights (unblinking) flying under clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in my car driving home from a friends house.
2. i notice an object coming up behind me on the highway, i thought it was an emergency vehicle, but there was only one red light, i thought the other red light was out.
3. it was maybe about a 1/2 mile behind me when i noticed it.
4. after i saw it, it started coming up behind me and the closer it got the higher it got until it was over my car. a bright light glowed all around my car and inside and then it was gone.
5. i was terrified, hen i got home, i woke my mother and told her what happened and she gave me something to calm me down and told me to never talk about what happened.
6. the object went south over a hill very fast.
content.summary: Red and while lights - round

content.detailedDescription:
First one then 3 circles hovering in sky. disappeared and reappeared in different spots made triangle shape when all 3. 
1. in bedroom watching fireworks out of window. these were above the fireworks. 
2. cause it was just a cylinder light hovering in the sky. and it moved quickly to hover in another place and then there was 3 of them and they would disappear and reappear. i couldn't see them move. they just appeared and reappeared in a different area. 
3. thought it may be a plane but it didn't move just hovered and no blinking light just constant. much larger than a star. 
4. see 2
5. i felt like it knew i was looking at it and was worried what it might do. 
6.  we were tired and started watching tv. we looked back about a half hour later and they were gone.
content.summary: First one then 3 circles hovering in sky. disappeared and reappeared in different spots made triangle shape when all 3.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the back stairs of the house shortly after 1am talking on the phone with a friend. all of a sudden my phone went completely dead. i had just charged it, but it would not turn back on. suddenly, the sky grew bright behind the house, i looked up and two round looking objects shot overhead no more then 500ft above me. they continued straight, then shot off at 90 degree angles from each other. they then began to execute several sharp maneuvers that as an amateur pilot i know aren't possible to be done with conventional aircraft.  they glowed and pulsed with a blue green and orangish yellow colors, sometimes randomly other times staying solid. the even lasted maybe 45seconds to a minute before both suddenly shot straight up and disappeared.
content.summary: Lights in sky low pass over new bern

content.detailedDescription: I was about 6 or 7 years old when these entities appeared to me. i used to sleep with my mom since my parents relationship was heading in opposite ways so i slept with my mom and younger brother in the same room. i remember i awoke out of the blue one night and to my surprise or horror there were 3 entities standing about 5-6 feet away from the foot of my bed. they were small in size 2-3 ft and had the large eyes and very slim bodies. they almost looked like stick figures is the best way i can describe them. the one in the front was the smallest while the other two behind him were a little bit larger. they were not "grey" like so many describe them. they had a yellowish whitesh luminosity around them. almost like if their skin and bodies were part  of that luminosity. i recall the one in the middle was the one i believe was in charge or wanted something from me. upon seeing this sight, the first thing i did was cover my head with the blanket in total fear. my dad worked late on the weekends at a jewish temple and on the weekends he would always come home around 3:00 am or later. so moments after seeing this sight i hear my dad coming home. the moment i heard him open the door i ran out of bed (they were gone) and said daddy please let me sleep with you i'm scared. he used to sleep on the sofa. now being an adult i ask myself why didn't i tell my dad what i saw. i just told him i was scared to please let me sleep with him. what was odd is that my dad always used to put the television on then fall asleep watching it. that night he took his tux off and went right to bed on the couch with me. he fell asleep immediately. i was still up. moments after he fell asleep these entities reappeared. this time they started approaching me i was vulnerable on the couch since i didn't have a blanket so they continued to approach to the point where i was frozen in fear and all i  remember was kicking one. i don't recall anything after that until that morning that i awoke and told my mom what happened. she asked me to draw what i had seen and she was shocked at what i drew cause she also saw something very similar when she was a child in cuba.  i don't know what happened to me but all i can say is i've also have had very weird experiences in my life. i've always felt that someone is watching me. i don't know if i was abducted or not since i don't recall anything after i kicked the entity however a few months after  this incident my younger brother tells my mom her frying pan was flying around in our room. she also asked him to describe it and he used the chrome surrounding our medicine cabinet to best describe the light or frying pan as he described.  side note my mom and i have have a weird red mark on the back of our necks.
content.summary: 3 entities appeared to me as a child. they approached and i don't recall anything after.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were walking down the road at about 2 am. i was 14, he was 15. a bright light shines on us. we both thought a car was coming down the road. we looked behind us and there was nothing but the light was still there. i still remember clear as day seeing a shadow on his face from the brim of his hat. i don't know what made us both look at the same part of the sky, but we both looked at the sky. we both seen a light that vanished seconds after we seen it. it looked just like a star in the sky and then just vanished. after, i thought if we were abducted, maybe when they put us back we were looking in the same direction of the craft because of them putting us back. we didn't know what to think. we continued on our walk. we walked less than 30 mins and then back. we left around 1:30. we didn't get back until 3:30. an hour just gone. the truly crazy thing is when i was young, too young to remember, my father (a very honest person)  seen a chevron shaped craft at our house (practically same location) and it hovered for a bit before taking off very fast. it rattled the windows at our house, and our friend about a mile away said her whole house shook too. people as far as 20 plus miles away we know heard it along with thousands we don't know. i was told over 1300 people's called into local airport (williamsport/montoursville airport) to see if they had anything on radar and they said no. i don't know if it is the area i was living in or if it has something to do with my family, but two truthful sightings in the same area within 10 years happened to me and my father.
content.summary: Looked like a star in sky, perfect circle of light around me and friend, 1 hour loss of time

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were walking down the road at about 2 am. i was 14, he was 15. a bright light shines on us. we both thought a car was coming down the road. we looked behind us and there was nothing but the light was still there. i still remember clear as day seeing a shadow on his face from the brim of his hat. i don't know what made us both look at the same part of the sky, but we both looked at the sky. we both seen a light that vanished seconds after we seen it. it looked just like a star in the sky and then just vanished. after, i thought if we were abducted, maybe when they put us back we were looking in the same direction of the craft because of them putting us back. we didn't know what to think. we continued on our walk. we walked less than 30 mins and then back. we left around 1:30. we didn't get back until 3:30. an hour just gone. the truly crazy thing is when i was young, too young to remember, my father (a very honest person)  seen a chevron shaped craft at our house (practically same location) and it hovered for a bit before taking off very fast. it rattled the windows at our house, and our friend about a mile away said her whole house shook too. people as far as 20 plus miles away we know heard it along with thousands we don't know. i was told over 1300 people's called into local airport (williamsport/montoursville airport) to see if they had anything on radar and they said no. i don't know if it is the area i was living in or if it has something to do with my family, but two truthful sightings in the same area within 10 years happened to me and my father.
content.summary: Looked like a star in sky, perfect circle of light around me and friend, 1 hour loss of time

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my friend back home and i was giving her a boost over the wall and i pooked up while cuffing my hands and seen a glowing red sphere with a ultraviolet blue ring surrounding it . i asked if she seen it to and she was stunned to see it. it made 2 very long zigzags very fast and lowered, hovering slowly into the skyline. it was almost unbelievable how it looked like something from a movie.
content.summary: I was walking my female friend back home and we seen a red ball with a blue ring around it.

content.detailedDescription:
i'm terrified two separate sightings two separate craft other witnesses i don't know what to say. 
first one,me and two other friends are in a car it's close to 9 pm i saw a plane then what looked like headlights then it got closer and descending it turned it was a sphere with a ring around it with to lights on either side of the sphere on the ring and watched us it had some kind of art all over the sphere and it was rotating inside the ring then it was gone and the sky got busy with planes and helicopters. 

the second, just tonight at 10 22 pm me and my mother where out side when i saw two lights blinking in unison i pointed them out to her then we saw it was one object massive silently just flying it got closer then went out of sight.
content.summary: I'm terrified two separate sightings two separate craft other witnesses i don't know what to say

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was walking on the beach
i just happened to take a photo with my iphone of the sunset
when i first saw it on the photo it looked like a ufo
it was stationary, it looks like there is an alien being inside- you can see his big head, and there 
looks like a window and two exhaust things on the outside of the craft. it didn't look like any of the clouds 
i felt normal when i took the photo and then once i realized what looked like a ufo i was like this is pretty cool and was fascinated by it especially seeing what looks like an alien inside the craft
i just took a few photos and thats it, i didn't realize i had a ufo on the photo until i looked at it later.
content.summary: I took a photo of the sunset and caught an alien flying a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
This is actually a twofold report.

two years before my sighting, my wife received a phone call from neighbors about a strange light that was hovering in the field beyond our houses.
my wife (and neighbors) witnessed this light hovering every night for
five days. finally the neighbors voted my wife to be the one to call
authorities about the phenomenon. she did. the police were not receptive and the next night the light went away not to return.

two years later on an extremely clear, warm summer night i was sitting on our patio gazing at the stars and enjoy their beauty when i saw a light
in the far horizon. i watched it travel to mid-sky at extreme speed--my guestament over 10,000 miles per hour. it suddenly stopped mid-sky and hovered for a good 45 minutes. i kept my eyes clued to it since after it stopped it looked just like one more star in the sky. anyway, after the forty-five minutes it reversed its position and flew back from where it first appeared. it was amazing to see and of course very thought provoking.

my wife's sighting was treetop level
mine was very high
content.summary: One was treetop and close--one was very high into the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of may 9th, 2015, around 9:40 pm eastern time (gmt -5) i saw a light in the sky outside my window. the light was bright enough that i saw it through 4 layers of dusty glass and just by glancing up from my computer monitor. the light was in the sky just above where i look to see my computer monitor. at first i thought the light was a low flying commercial air-liner. that should give some idea of the apparent size and luminosity of the object. 
i regularly observe conventional aircraft flying past my window as that area is an approach and departure lane for flights to and from the tri cities regional airport not far from here. the object i saw seemed out of place because it appeared to be coming at me nearly straight on, which is a flight pattern i have never seen from this position before. the light was white in the middle and very bright and about 15 or 20 times the size of a common star. all around the white light were smaller lights of different colors which included red, green, blue, yellow, purple, and orange.

 at first i was only able to see the red and white lights and this is why i thought the object was an out of place airliner. something didn't seem right, even aside from the fact that i've never seen an airliner flying this way before, so i decided to keep watching. after only a few minutes my eyes had adjusted somewhat and i was able to see the other colors of light and, by this time, the object hadn't moved so i knew that it wasn't a conventional fixed wing aircraft. the next thing i did was kill all the sources of sound and light in the room and open the window to listen for rotor noise. i could not hear any. i knew that even if the object were a helicopter or a uav i might not be able to hear it due to distance, wind speed and direction, noise pollution, or possibly because of rotor silencing technology. i kept watching. soon after i started listening for rotor noise, i closed my window and headed towards the back porch. as i was walking down the hallway i saw my father, [redacted], who had just returned home with my mother, [redacted]. i told him i was watching a ufo and he went to the back porch with me to see it. he saw the object and promptly went inside to get some binoculars. it was his opinion that the object was “something” meaning it wasn't explainable or conventional. the 3 of us continued to watch the object from the back porch for a while before i went to get my binoculars. i was not able to get a perfect focus with my cheap binoculars but i could see the object and its multi-colored lights in a little bit more detail. after struggling with the binoculars for a while i decided to go inside to get my camera and tripod. after figuring out how to set my camera for long-exposure i set it up on the tripod and put the lens on the object and took 3 or 4 pictures. i also took 2 videos. i continued to watch the object for a total of about 3 hours before i finally had to go to sleep. the object slowly became smaller and smaller until it was only about twice the apparent size of an average star. the object never moved in a way that was noticeable over a period of less than 30 minutes. the colored lights continued the entire time i watched the object. some time towards the end of my period of watching the lights/object i posted some pictures on facebook where it received a lot of attention from my facebook friends. at least 4 other people (7 people total, including myself) saw the object and, strangely, one of the people (person 2) told me he was looking in a different direction than i was looking to see the object. this seems to suggest to me that the object was not celestial/astronomical but was actually inside of earths atmosphere or that the object moved a very long distance before i spotted it. the people who said they saw the object are [redacted](person 1), (person 2), and (person 3). (person 1) said that another person that he was with also saw the object. (person 2) and (person 3) gave the direction of the object as “due west” and “north east”, respectively. (person 2) was about 7 or 8 miles from me when he saw the object. i do not know where (person 3) was when he saw the object.

the next night (may 10th/11th) i saw the object either near to or in the same place it was at the same time the night of the 9th. the object was a smaller size than it was when i spotted it at the same time of night on the 9th. other than its size, the object was the same on both nights. i watched the object for about 2 hours on the night of the 10th/morning of the 11th (until about 12:30am). on the night of the 11th i went to my sisters house to borrow her nikon dslr camera so that i could get some better pictures but it was cloudy that night and, if the object was still there/had come back, i could not see it. it was also very cloudy on the night of the 12th. tonight, which is the 13th, i took my sisters camera and my tripod outside to get some pictures, but i have not been able to locate the object even though it is only slightly cloudy. there are lots of trees surrounding the yard so the object could be out there somewhere where i can not see it. i will keep watching the skies as i always do and take more and better pictures if it comes back.
content.summary: The object was large when i spotted it then slowly became much smaller. watched it 2 nights in a row.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to have a smoke after working 15 hours driving coal truck. saw something that didn't look like a star but looked like one !Went inside and grabbed my vcr camcorder and zoomed in and was starled at what i saw and recordered. it looked like it was long with lights along the side with a very bright engine, quessing it was a static electric magnetic engine very quite, could hear a pin drop. am raising two on my own, at the time they were 7 and 9 and had picked them up from daycare put them to bed ! my daughter was making noise so i went back inside for just a minute, went back outside to record more and it was gone ! stayed outside for another hour but to tired to stay awake and went to bed around eleven !
content.summary: Large craft hovering in the air 50 yards above the ground then disapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside at night having a cigarette and i always love to look at the night sky. on this night i saw this white star like shape moving across the sky then it changed direction in the blink of a eye and headed in a totally different direction.

i called my son out and my wife to witness this and again it changed back to the fisrt heading that it was on in the first place.

my son, wife and i have been watching this happen on many occassions as  this light is a common occurence for us.

i said to my wife and son that if my wife and i were not counselling practitioners then i would of thought that we were crazy.  

it is always an amazing feeling when i see this happen as it does happen a fair few times per year and i hate the feeling of watching the light fade into the distance at a fast speed.

i am a believer in life on other planets and we would love any feedback that you could give us because not everyone gets to witness this spectacular event like i do.

i tried to get ffotage from my mobile phone but the object is too far away and the street lighting has a bad effect on the recording which i am most disapointed about.
content.summary: White glowing object heading one direction then quickly changed direction in the blink of the eye lasting about nine minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Im not exactly sure but i believe it was 2008 or 2009 when i lived across street from my son we were sitting on his patio visiting on a summer evening around 7pm i was heading back to my apartment when something in the distance caught my eye at frist i thought a ballon came loose from some advertisement or something as it came closer i was unbelievably large i ran to my sons apt for him to come see it by then it was over our apartment complex it was then we all noticed 4  more following behind it one neighbor came out to ask us what we were looking at she and several other neighbors also came out we were all shocked and woundering what we were all seeing all of us seemed frozen althou we all had cell phone camras we seemed unable to focouse on any thing but looking at the 5 black objects as the slowly disappeared they made a slight turn as if heading toward the columbia river then turned headed east and disappeared this observation as i rember lasted 7 to 10 miniutes i cant find any one else that reported this but many had to have seen it i think it was a sundy afternoon this report is true and recalled from the best i can rember for such time has passed i never stop woundering what we all saw that day
content.summary: Myself ,my son his roommate. and several neighboers all wittnessed this event

content.detailedDescription: Ok, i was young like seven, six or seven. night had just fallen. my father was outside and me and mom come out.Theres this low slow , like a ball of fire orange light. i think when i first saw it it was a small distance away, 300 m or so, ne. then it s glides over to the north anddoes this, gets nosey and goes almost over our heads n to s then se, pausing first, and also before the end. dont remember heat or not. at closest, it appeared like 50m or so away, but looking up isnt great for distance. if there were other features to it, they didnt much register. noise... certainly no chopper.  i don't  know if it was silent, but may well have been. also, have memory of like looking down on the folks and myself while looking up at the light. no odour i recall. and then just gone. before mom passed i asked her, but she nor dad recall. i think thats it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: What i remember from a long way ago.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 04:30 am ct on thursday, 14 may 2015 , i was on my front porch with my dp as we were enjoying an early cup of coffee before she had to leave for work. on this particular morning, she had to be there early.
 
our house is located almost directly underneath the approach path for our local airport. over time, we have seen most every plane imaginable, short of the larger, full-sized airliners, as they come into auburn/opelika municipal/university airport. 
 
at this time of morning, there was no traffic on the road in front of our home and the sky was completely clear.
 
i noticed what i first assumed to be a plane that would make a right-bank turn to line up with the runway. this would not be unusual. however, the lighting was odd in that it would have had to be a plane facing us to offer anything close to what we were seeing in width and display. moreover, there was not a sound. 
 
the object crossed the sky from left to right at a very leisurely speed. our field of vision was limited due to trees but overall, it was visible for roughly one full minute.
 
when it passed behind the trees, i could still see it by bit and piece through the leaves for another few seconds.
 
attached to this email are two graphics. one is a picture of our field of view and the other, a map showing the standard approach to the airport, what would have been expected on such an approach and what we eventually, actually witnessed. 
 
also, on the map graphic, i have included a reproduction of what we saw using some old graphics programs i have had for about a decade. it is not identical but it is fairly close to offer an idea of what was up there.
content.summary: multi-colored flying vehicle making no sound

content.detailedDescription: Hello i am reporting this fantastic event even though its been over 15 yrs i will never forget this unbelievable real ufo sighting. i was driving back from tuscon arizona on the i-10 interstate hwy heading back to riverside ca. it was app. 10 o'clock at night and i was in the middle of nowhere on this deserted hwy  i just happen to look up out of the drivers side window and i noticed this large completely round  30 to 40 ft basketball object. it was a dark brownish color ball.  i became very curious because it had no wings engines tail no lights it just cruised app. 500 mph towards ca. the weather was very good with no clouds. it moved in a very direct straight path at about 5 to 8 thousand feet  i was amazed very amazed how it just moved westward with no lights no noise ! as i was driving my car then the object passed me and about 3 more minutes it suddenly shot off at tremendous speed ! over the horizon ! i,d guess 50,000 mph unbelievable!  never seen anything like it  i was lucky to have witnessed this highly advanced machine in the sky  the g forces alone would crush a human.  this was not a meteor, comet, satellite or any man made object. it was a very very advanced intelligent ufo !  i would of loved to see its propulsion system  completely silent very powerful !  ufos do exist !  because i witnessed it   i had been employed as an engineer at the jet propulsion laboratory in pasadena california. and i know the difference between satellites and advanced off this world ufo,s this statement is given in complete honesty   i,m sorry i did not have a camera at this time.  thank you  dd.
content.summary: It moved towads california on i-10 hwy  then shot off at incredible speed

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio and heard a noise like an airplane but not like an airplane at the same time. it was like a big triangle and it had three lights, one on each point, then i called my brother outside and he agreed that it wasn't an airplane, so we watched it for almost an hour. it sort of looked like when police use helicopters to search for people and they try to stay in one area but it wasn't searching for anyone, i don't think. it would fly around for a few minutes and go in all different directions then it'd just stop then start flying again. at one point, we'd thought that it left because we didn't see it anymore so my brother went back in the house but i waited for it to show up again, it came back a few minutes later but it just flew around for a couple of minutes and flew away. when it first showed up, it was still pretty light out so i got a pretty good look at the shape of it, but it ended up getting dark and we were only able to see the lights the rest of the time. i tried getting a picture of it but it kept coming out blurry on my phone's camera.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It just flew around for a bit then it'd hover for a bit, kind of looked like someone was test flying it
